thread.title: Amid Spending Questions, White House Defends Trump’s Golf-Resort Trips
thread.title_full: Amid Spending Questions, White House Defends Trump’s Golf-Resort Trips - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Rebecca Ballhaus
title: Amid Spending Questions, White House Defends Trump’s Golf-Resort Trips
text: President Donald Trump on Thursday released a budget blueprint calling for sharp cuts to spending on foreign aid, the arts, environmental protection and other areas to pay for a bigger military and more secure border. The next day, he left Washington for his fifth weekend at Mar-a-Lago, his luxurious private golf resort in Palm Beach, Fla.—a trip   Capital Journal Daybreak: Wiretapping Answers Today? | Gorsuch Hearing Begins | Trump's Bumps Continue Next What's Next in Judge Gorsuch's Supreme Court Confirmation Process
